Shepherd of Souls.name: Shepherd of Souls
Shepherd of Souls.blurb: Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.
Shepherd of Souls.description: Final Service: Yorick raises a grave for every enemy champion and 12th / 6th / 2nd (based on level) non-champion enemy that dies near him, as well as for every enemy he kills with  Last Rites. Only 4 graves can exist at the same time, with the furthest ones being replaced by the newest.
Shepherd of Souls.description2: Yorick can use  Awakening to raise a Mist Walker from a grave.
Shepherd of Souls.description3: The Horde: There can only exist 4 Mist Walkers at the same time, with the closest ones being replaced by the newest.
Shepherd of Souls.notes: * Units dying to  Last Rites don't lower Shepherd of Souls' counter.

Last Rites.name: Last Rites
Last Rites.blurb: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
Last Rites.description: Active - Last Rites: Yorick's next basic attack within 6 seconds has  50 bonus range, deals  bonus physical damage, and  heals him for  12 − 82 (based on level) health, doubled to  24 − 164 (based on level) health if he is  below 50% maximum health.
Last Rites.description2: If there are at least 3 graves nearby and Last Rites has been cast or is on  cooldown, Yorick is granted the ability to cast  Awakening. Awakening will remain cast-able until there're no graves nearby.
Last Rites.description3: Last Rites resets Yorick's basic attack timer.
Last Rites.notes: * Last Rites damage can affect structures.

Awakening.name: Awakening
Awakening.blurb: Yorick summons Mist Walkers from the graves around him.
Awakening.description: Active – Awakening: Yorick exhumes a Mist Walker under his command from each nearby grave.
Awakening.notes: * Mist Walkers update their stats when Yorick's stats change.

Dark Procession.name: Dark Procession
Dark Procession.blurb: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
Dark Procession.description: Active: After a 1-second delay, Yorick summons a circular wall of spirits around the target area that lasts up to 4 seconds and acts as impassable terrain for enemies, while allowing allies to walk through.
Dark Procession.description2: Dark Procession can only be targeted by enemy champion basic attacks and takes 1 damage per attack, dissolving after taking enough damage.  Turret shots instantly dissolve the wall.
Dark Procession.notes: * Dark Procession will  knock up enemies away from it on-cast and trigger in-combat effects such as drawing turret aggro, applying  Elixir of Sorcery and  Sudden Impact.

Mourning Mist.name: Mourning Mist
Mourning Mist.blurb: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
Mourning Mist.description: Active: Yorick hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an off-centered area, dealing 15% of target's current health  magic damage to all enemies hit, down to a minimum threshold.
Mourning Mist.description2: Affected enemy champions and monsters are  slowed by 30% for 2 seconds, and are marked for 4 seconds, during which Yorick, Mist Walkers and the The Maiden gain  20% bonus movement speed when moving towards them.
Mourning Mist.description3: Mist Walkers will  leap to enemy champions affected by the mark.

Eulogy of the Isles.name: Eulogy of the Isles
Eulogy of the Isles.blurb: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
Eulogy of the Isles.description: Active: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist along with Mist Walkers, which remain on the battlefield until she or Yorick dies.
Eulogy of the Isles.description2: While the Maiden of the Mist is alive, Eulogy of the Isles can be reactivated to set the Maiden free, letting her push the nearest lane until she dies.
Eulogy of the Isles.notes:
* See the Pets section below for more details about Maiden of the Mist and Mist Walkers.
 The Maiden updates its stats when Yorick's stats change.
